page.title: 07JOBS-YALDING,NETTLESTEAD
page.content: Although the area consists mainly of a variety of farms, few permanent jobs now exist on the land because of mechanisation. Fruit and hops provide a large number of jobs for seasonal casual workers but whereas 30-40 years ago several hundreds of workers flooded the villages to help pick the hops, even that task is now mechanised and few are needed. In Yalding many jobs are provided by Imperial Chemical Industries, the workforce being drawn from a wide area. Also in Yalding Messrs Hovells' factory produces candles and receives for packing Xmas crackers and cake decorations which workers have made in their homes. These Xmas crackers and those from the firm's Parkwood, Maidstone factory, are despatched from Yalding. Many people commute, some to London.
